game.name: Ocean in the Cold Sky
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, 협동, 스크린 공유 및 분할 협동, 공유 및 분할 화면, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, Remote Play Together, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: You can manually parry attacks, fly a little with your meagre wings, and die instantly.
game.shortDescriptionEn: You can manually parry attacks, fly a little with your meagre wings, and die instantly.
